description: BR-57 is the Regional Transport Office (RTO) located in Sasaram, serving as the primary registration authority for the Rohtas district in Bihar. It was established to manage the increasing volume of vehicle registrations and licensing in the region, supplementing the existing BR-24 code. The office is responsible for issuing driving licenses, vehicle registration certificates, and ensuring the collection of road taxes for the Sasaram subdivision.
address: District Transport Office (DTO), Sasaram, Geeta Ghat Colony, Sasaram, Rohtas, Bihar
